snippet: As they seek to maintain a power base in Albany, Republicans running for re-election have found an unlikely standard-bearer in the name and image of Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo, a Democrat.
abstract: New York State Republicans find an unlikely standard-bearer in Gov Andrew M Cuomo, as they seek to maintain a power base in Albany; candidates hope that promoting their ability to work with the popular Democratic governor will help them hold on to control of the State Senate, their last stronghold in New York.
lead_paragraph: As they seek to maintain a power base in Albany, Republicans running for re-election have found an unlikely standard-bearer in the name and image of Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo, a Democrat.

headline.seo: New York Republican Candidates Embrace Cuomo’s Crossover Appeal
headline.print_headline: Republicans Embracing The Appeal Of Cuomo
